title: Main export partners of Germany 2017
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total exports in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share in total exports 8.8 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Switzerland where Country is 4.2.
The Share in total exports of Country United States is 2.1% larger than the minimum value at Switzerland.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total exports in each Country on the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Share in total exports and Switzerland has the lowest Share in total exports.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total exports in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share in total exports 8.8 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at Switzerland where Country is 4.2.
The Share in total exports of Country United States is 2.1% larger than the minimum value at Switzerland.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total exports for 9 number of Countrys.
The Share in total exports is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
The second highest Share in total exports is appeared to be the Country France.
The highest Country United States has 4.6 more Share in total exports than the lowest Country Switzerland.
Country United States is higher than any other Countrys with value 8.8, followed by France, and China. Down to Country Switzerland with the lowest value 4.2.
The lowest value 4.2 at Switzerland is almost 1.41 times smaller than the average value 6.22.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 56.0.
